snippet: Major stock indexes held on to the previous day’s large gains even as the euro dropped sharply against the dollar.
abstract: Major stock indexes are little changed in a low-volume session, but some investors are encouraged to see equities avoid a sell-off amid the euro zone's lingering debt problems.
lead_paragraph: Major stock indexes held on to the previous day’s large gains even as the euro dropped sharply against the dollar.

headline.seo: Indexes Remain Steady Amid Europe’s Debt Woes
headline.main: Indexes Remain Steady Amid Europe’s Debt Woes
headline.print_headline: Indexes Remain Steady Amid Europe’s Debt Woes
